docs.lead_paragraph: A comprehensive chronicle of abuses committed by the American government after the Sept. 11 attacks should be declassified.
docs.abstract: Editorial calls on Pres Obama to reverse his decision not to declassify 2014 Senate report on secret CIA prison network; argues torturing detainees in wake of Sept 11 attacks was mistake and full disclosure would help prevent it from happening in future.
docs.snippet: A comprehensive chronicle of abuses committed by the American government after the Sept. 11 attacks should be declassified....
